segments.text: What are you going to do after you return from Washington ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to stay in the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What will you do all day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to work with my father at the store . In the evening , I'll read books.On weekends , I'll go to the beach with my family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but I can learn . What are you going to do this summer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to camp . I've gone to camp for four summers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never gone to camp . What do you do there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We do many things . In the morning , we go swimming and boating . In the afternoon , we play basketball or tennis . We sit around a camp fire at night.We sing or tell stories .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is wonderful . What's John going to do this summer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think he's going to the mountains with his parents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , so long , Mary . Have fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You too , Peter . Give my regards to John . I'll see you in September .
segments.speaker: S2
